page.title: 10PRIORY PRIMARY SCHOOL,2.
page.content: Near to summer the classes go on school excursions to places like Sewerby Park or Hornsea Potteries etc. In the autumn the school has a Harvest Festival which parents can go to. At Christmas the children present a Nativity play for the parents to watch. Some children help with the gardening in the quadrangle as well as going on small outings. {BRIEF HISTORY OF THE SCHOOL.} {18.4.1939.}The school was opened, for pupils aged 5-11. 128 pupils were admitted. {6.9.1949}-The school was due to be divided into a Junior school and an Infants school, but as the Junior school building was not ready all 531 children were accommodated in the present building. {20.2.1950.}The new Junior school building was opened (240 pupils).
